description:
GPS Camera combines location tagging with powerful map and travel tools. Capture photos with GPS details, explore interactive maps, check traffic updates, and access essential navigation features in one application.

Main Features:
- GPS Camera: Capture photos with location, date, and time details.
- Live Cameras: View selected public cameras from different locations.
- 360 View: Explore panoramic images for a wider perspective.
- Earth 3D Map: Navigate the globe with interactive 3D views.
- Traffic Map: Stay updated with traffic conditions in real time.
- Famous Places: Discover landmarks and attractions worldwide.
- Compass: Find accurate directions easily.
- Air Quality: Check local air conditions instantly.
- World Clock: Track multiple time zones in one place.

Why GPS Camera:
- Simple all in one design.
- Practical features for daily use and travel.
- Reliable navigation and exploration tools.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/terra-cam-gps/privacy-policy
Download Vitaria now and build better habits for a healthier tomorrow.Download GPS Camera today and start capturing, exploring, and navigating with confidence.

Explore the world your way with the personalised Emirates App for iPhone and Apple Watch. 

1. SEARCH AND BOOK YOUR NEXT GETAWAY
Search for flights to over 150 destinations around the world, and complete your entire booking through the app.

2. MANAGE YOUR TRIP ON THE GO
Choose your meal and seat preference, and add services such as Chauffeur-drive. It’s easy to update your details, and you can view your full itinerary at any time - even when you’re offline.

3. DOWNLOAD YOUR BOARDING PASS
Check in online and download your boarding pass. You can print it, or send it to your phone via SMS or email to use it as a digital boarding pass.
On The Emirates App for iPhone and iPad you can download your boarding pass directly to Wallet.

4. GET REAL-TIME FLIGHT UPDATES
We’ll send you real-time information about your check-in, departure gate, boarding time, baggage belt and more, straight to your personal device. Tailor the app to your needs by choosing which notifications you want to receive.

5. GET THE MOST OUT OF EMIRATES SKYWARDS
Explore ways to earn and spend your Skywards Miles directly within the app. Enjoy easy access to information about your tier status, benefits and Skywards Miles balance, and manage your account wherever you are.

6. THE EMIRATES APP FOR APPLE WATCH 
Get live travel updates at a glance. The app reminds you when it’s time to board, lets you know if there’s a change to your flight and tells you where to pick up your bags when you land – all without you reaching for your phone.

Complete all your border procedures with the official Seychelles e-Border government app.

Simply provide the requested information and you can submit your Travel Authorization, Disembarkation and Embarkation Information Forms.

Key features:

- The fastest way to submit your application.
- Available for all people traveling to and from the Seychelles.
- Securely store your passport and contact information for yourself and anyone in your family to save time when you next apply.
- Store other documents, such as yellow fever vaccination certificates securely within the app

Please note that all data submitted via the app is used for the sole purpose of your Travel Authorization or Disembarkation and Embarkation Information Forms, unless you specifically opt-in to receive information from third parties.

To find out more, visit https://seychelles.govtas.com/ 

We look forward to seeing you in the Seychelles!

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and functions like a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan for your travel destination.
3. Install the eSIM.
4. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet upon arrival.

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim 

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help  

Join the Airalo community! 
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy

Terms & Conditions
www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions

AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN’T
Explore 8+ million holiday rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you’re travelling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who’ve stayed there think about it too.

DON’T JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best – all vetted for quality based on a host’s expertise, reputation and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals – extraordinary experiences hosted by the world’s most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hairstyling, nail treatments, make-up, massages, personal training and spa treatments – each offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don’t need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blow-dry, training session and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you’ll get personalised recommendations on the home page suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you’re staying and who you’re travelling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you’ve been to on Airbnb and the people you’ve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation – making it easier for everyone to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos and even customise an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you’ve booked in the updated Trips tab, it’s simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions and entry codes all in one place, even when you’re offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience or service, you can reach millions of people travelling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you’re ready to welcome the world.

YOU’VE COME THIS FAR – NOW GO FURTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

Roamy — turn saved posts into real trips

Thousands of travel videos saved across your Instagram and TikTok… and zero time to turn them into a plan? You can’t search those folders, you keep rewatching clips to find the exact spot, pinning places on Google Maps takes forever, and spreadsheets don’t tell you how far anything is. We get it. Trip planning from scratch is painful—and your saved folder is begging to be used.

Roamy fixes the mess. With one tap, pull every location mentioned in a video, drop them onto a map, and see your entire collection of spots—clearly, visually, and all in one place. When you’re ready to go, just tell Roamy how many days you have. We’ll build a sensible, day-by-day itinerary that connects the dots for you. Trip planning, minus the stress.

Who Roamy is for
- You’ve got dozens of folders and thousands of saved travel posts across Instagram and TikTok.
- You love picking the spots—but hate the logistics.
- You want everything in one place: your saved locations, a clean map, and a plan that actually fits your days.

How it works

- 1-tap save from socials: Import places from TikTok/Instagram with a single click. Roamy detects locations mentioned in the video and adds them for you.
- See everything on a map: No more scattered folders or notes. Your saved spots appear on a clean map so you can visualize your trip at a glance.
- Your master collection: Keep every restaurant, landmark, café, and hidden gem in one organized list—with links back to the original posts and reviews.
- Get your perfect itinerary: Tell Roamy your trip length and we’ll arrange your days into a logical route so you’re not zig-zagging across town.
- Duplicate & share trips: Copy community guides or friends’ itineraries and customize them to your style—or share your own with a link.
- Review & go: Tap any spot for details, tips, and prep notes so you know exactly why it’s on your list.

Why people love it
- Turns chaos into clarity: Your social saves become a visual, actionable plan.
- Saves hours: Stop rewatching videos and manually pinning.
- Keeps your taste: It’s your collection—Roamy just organizes it and makes it trip-ready.
- Stress-free planning: From “I saved it” to “I’m going” in a few taps

Join our community of avid travelers—share your trip and get inspired on where to go next:  https://discord.gg/5YvVUcVgNy

The world's best flight tracker app - #1 Travel app in over 150 countries.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a live flight tracker and see planes around the world move in real-time on a detailed map. Or point your device at a plane to find out where it’s going and what kind of aircraft it is. Download for free today and discover why millions are already tracking flights and checking flight status with Flightradar24.

• Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time
• Identify flights overhead & see flight information—including a photo of the actual aircraft—by simply pointing your device at the sky 
• See what the pilot of an aircraft sees in 3D 
• Tap on a plane for flight details such as route, estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, aircraft type, speed, altitude, high-resolution photos of the actual aircraft & more.
• See historical data & watch playback of past flights
• Tap on an airport icon for arrival & departure boards, flight status, aircraft on the ground, current delay stats, & detailed weather conditions
• Search and bookmark individual flights using flight number, airport, or airline
• Filter flights by airline, aircraft, altitude, speed, & more
• Get a detailed list of all flights in your area.
• View aircraft in 3D with hundreds of new aircraft and airline liveries added.

Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
SILVER

• 90 days of flight history
• More aircraft details
• More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
• Filters and alerts to find and track flights
• Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
GOLD

• All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
• 365 days of flight history
• Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
• Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky
• Air traffic control boundaries that show which controllers are responsible for a flight
• Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS

Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 50,000 ground stations around the world to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration (MLAT), we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. 

CONNECT WITH US

We love getting feedback on FR24. Since we’re unable to respond directly to reviews, you can contact us directly and we’ll be happy to assist.
• Email (support@fr24.com)
• X (@Flightradar24)
• Facebook (@Flightradar24)
• YouTube (@Flightradar24DotCom)

DISCLAIMER

The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement.

Terms of Service: https://www.flightradar24.com/terms-and-conditions

Travel is now redefined. Upgrade your travel experience with the brand-new Ethiopian Airlines Mobile App and enjoy up to 10 percent discount.

Features:

1.	Booking

Manage your booking easily! Select between one way or round trip, choose your origin and destination airport, flight date, search fares with money or miles option, select fare, provide personal detail, contact detail and select your preferred meal type, select your payment option and purchase your ticket, you can also have the option to pay with miles for Sheba Miles member, hold on reservation or pay at agent.

2.	My Trips

Walk through your booking! You can see your past and upcoming trip summary, manage your trips, view itinerary and pricing detail, select your preferred seat, update your travel document information and contact detail, continue to payment for hold on reservations.


3.	Check-in & Boarding

You can check-in by entering booking reference number, ticket number, or frequent flyer number, select the passengers for check-in, select seat for each of the passengers, provide, travel document information, residence address, destination address and emergency contact detail based on the rule of the country where you are flying to, you can also continue to check-in by selecting the booking you made from the trip summary that we locally save for you in your phone. We finally generate and display your boarding passes.


4.	Flight Status

Select a destination of your choice and browse your flight status. You can search all Ethiopian flights by route or flight number and see the result for yesterday, today and tomorrow departure and arrival time, airport information and flight status.

Take your travel planning on the go with the Tripadvisor app. Discover tons of things to do, places to stay, and spots to eat, whether you’re mapping out your trip from your hotel room or looking for a quick rec in between tours. We’re here to guide you every step of the way. Whatever trip you’re planning, we’ve been there. 

Plan your travel in one place
 - Create an itinerary with Trips
 - Save your favorite hotels, restaurants, and experiences
 - Get custom recs based on your saves with our AI trip builder 
 - See all your saves on your map
 - Share and collaborate with your travel crew

Get traveler guidance

 - Check the reviews before you go or while you’re on the go
 - Save time with AI summaries, which gives you a quick overview of what travelers are saying

Find nearby recs

Write reviews wherever

Book with confidence

With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We’re Ryanair, so of course you’ll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you’ll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you’re on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars – all in one place.

No matter where you are – search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best air fare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights, Hotels and car hire with major airlines and providers  like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place.  Save time and money by comparing fares across multiple airlines and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

But Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find budget-friendly hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and holiday rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable car hire from top providers, with options to filter by vehicle type, fuel policy, and more.
Here’s how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discounted flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, holiday apartment rentals , motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you affordable options from top car hire agencies, including Hertz, Avis, Enterprise and Europcar . You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back. 

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and airlines, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place - easyJet, Ryanair, British Airways, Lufthansa, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your holiday. 

Why Skyscanner?
• The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
• The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
• Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
• Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”

• TikTok: @skyscanner
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/

Planes Live Free is a simple yet powerful flight tracking tool that lets you watch the planes online all over the world and get up-to-date information on flights instantly! Track the flights of your family members or beloved ones as if you were traveling with them and find the best time to pick them up at the airport. 

Whether you are a professional pilot or an aviation enthusiast, you'll definitely appreciate our flight tracker - the simple, clean and informative interface coupled with powerful functionality!

FEATURES
* Track planes and biplanes online all over the world
* Get notified about the flight schedule changes with handy alerts: be aware of the flight status, canceled flights, new departure and arrival time and more
* Search for particular flights, airports, ​and locations
* Get detailed information on flights: from aircraft characteristics and picture to its route and schedule
* Find up-to-date airport information that covers accurate departures and arrivals schedule, airport timezone and local time, its location and weather forecast
* Add airports and locations to "My Places" to access them instantly!

PREMIUM FEATURES
* Weather Overlays
* Unlimited number of alerts
* 2x faster data update
* Terminal, Check In, Gate and Baggage info
* No Ads

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Сoverage zone:
- Europe: up to 95% of the continent.
- South America: up to 90% of ADS-B coverage for airplanes.
- North America: close to 100% coverage of transmitter-enabled airplanes; 100% of data delivered with a delay of up to 5 minutes.
- Africa: major coverage of South Africa; partial coverage of the rest of the continent.
- Australia: 100% coverage.
- Asia: coverage of mainly densely populated areas.
- Oceania: 100% coverage.

Important Notice:
The airline tracker app uses data from several providers, which is collected from aircraft, equipped with ADS-B transmitters. ADS-B is not used by all airlines or aircraft. Due to technical limitations on how flight data is collected, ​it might be incomplete in some cases. We are working to improve this situation.

If you live in the European Union and wish to cancel your order, you may do so within 14 days.  You can do this by following the process laid out in the Apple App Store.  Please note and acknowledge: you cannot cancel your order or obtain a refund if you have downloaded the app and started using it (i.e. for example, by opening and using the App).

Privacy Policy: https://planeslive.com/privacyPolicy 
Terms: https://planeslive.com/terms

The trivago app is the easy way to search and compare hotel prices from your favourite booking sites so you can find a hotel or accommodation in the location you want, with the amenities you need, and for a deal you’ll feel amazing about.

- Compare accommodation prices from major booking sites with one search
- Get exclusive mobile rates on your phone or tablet
- Get price drop alerts for your favourite hotels 
- Save favourite accommodations and compare them side-by-side
- Read aggregated guest reviews from multiple booking sites
- Search over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries and find amazing hotel deals

No matter what type of traveler you are, or what type of budget you have, the trivago app makes your hotel search simpler than ever.

Compare prices from hundreds of booking sites
With trivago, you don’t just search for hotel offers in your dream vacation destinations, you also get to compare prices from the major booking sites like Expedia, Hotels.com, ebookers, Travel Republic, Booking.com, Priceline, Trip.com, ZenHotels, TUI, TravelUp, loveholidays.com, and more. With over 5 million hotels and other accommodations to choose from worldwide, finding the right stay at the right price doesn’t get much easier than this.

Mobile rates for deal-hunters on the go
The trivago app features deals on hotels that you can only access on your mobile device — something all you deal-hunters out there won’t want to miss out on. Just search for your hotel like you normally would, and keep an eye out for the “mobile rate” badge to know when you’ve found a special deal.

Get a heads-up when prices drop
Have a trip coming up and want to try and book your stay for cheap? Now you can sign up for price drop alerts on the trivago app to stay on top of price changes for your favourite hotels. Instead of constantly searching, you’ll get notified as soon as prices drop so you can act fast and get an awesome deal.

Save favourites and compare them side-by-side
Whether your dream hotel is pet-friendly, has late-checkout, offers free cancellation, or includes a breakfast buffet, the trivago app makes it easy to save your favourite stays. When you feel like booking your trip, you can compare hotels from your favourites list side-by-side to see how they match up before making your decision, so can always be confident you got the right stay at the right price.

Real talk from real guests
Along with always-updating price information, the trivago app aggregates guest ratings from major booking sites to give you the best understanding of real-world experiences at each hotel. The trivago rating index creates a combined score of available ratings so that you can see what other guests have to say, and always be ready to book your room with confidence.

5 million hotel beds and counting
With over over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries, you can find the perfect stay for every trip on the trivago app. Find rooms at boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, bed and breakfasts, lodges, vacation rentals, resorts, and everything in between with one simple search.

Download trivago’s free app today and start searching, comparing, and saving on your next adventure.

Visit trivago.co.uk for more info.

Passport.app is the new way to manage your passport.  Safely store your passport on your phone for secure access on-the-go. Keep track of expiry dates and save money by avoiding expensive last-minute renewals.


Features:
- Store your Passports on Your Mobile Device:  Save multiple passports and identity documents to use when you’re on-the-go.
- No more surcharges:  Get a reminder when your passport needs to be renewed and save money on late fees or surcharges. 
- Guarantee peace of mind: No more travel nightmares or mishaps for you or your family.
- Your identity safely at your fingertips: Your Passport is stored in your mobile device's secure area - think of it like a safe on your phone.
- Easily share your details, on your terms: Total control over what information you want to share, with whom and when.
- Capture your e-Passport biometric chip data.

Passport.app is Swiss-made software and a product of Travizory Border Security SA.

ZED: Your Affordable, Stress-Free Ride-Hailing Solution in Dubai 

Experience the future of transportation with ZED, where affordable, reliable, and personalized rides are just a tap away. Forget about surge pricing – get taxis and premium rides at consistent rates across Dubai. Whether you're heading to work, meeting friends, or exploring the city, ZED provides seamless, on-demand transport that suits your lifestyle. 
 

Discover Zed: The ride-hailing app that adapts to you 

Zed is designed to redefine the ride-hailing experience by providing personalized, convenient, and fast transportation solutions across Dubai. Our app connects you with a network of taxis, cabs, and premium cars, allowing you to find a ride that matches your unique needs. The renowned Dubai Taxis are just a click away. 
 

Key Features 

- Choose from a variety of ride options 

From taxis to premium cabs to limos, Zed offers a range of on-demand cars to suit your style and budget. 

- Personalized rides 

With Zed modes, you can choose a quiet or a chatty ride, the temperature inside the car, the ambient lighting, and the type and volume of music you want to listen to. 

-No surge pricing 

Taxis are priced consistently on Zed with no surge pricing even during peak hours. This ensures you always pay less for your ride. 

- Attractive discounts & offers 

Since we all love discounts, we decided to spread the love around by giving attractive discounts on both taxis and limo rides for all users making your ride cheaper and pocket friendly. 

- Journey for now, later, or everyday 

With Zed you can either book now or schedule your rides in advance. Also, our unique rhythm feature makes booking recurring trips easier than ever. Simply schedule your regular rides once, and Zed will take care of the rest. 

- Multiple destinations, one journey 

Schedule a multi-destination journey in advance for a hassle-free day and enjoy the moments that matter. 

- Safety & comfort first 

Our drivers are background-checked, professionally trained, and dedicated to providing you with a seamless, stress-free experience. Every ride is spotless and fresh to make your journey enjoyable. 

- 24/7 support & accessibility 

Need assistance? Zed’s dedicated support team is available around the clock to ensure your journey is smooth from start to finish. 

 

- Why choose Zed for your taxi and ride-hailing needs? 

Zed is not just another ride-hailing app; it’s a complete solution for personalized, on-demand travel. With a focus on user-friendly design, reliable service, cheaper and a wide selection of cars and cabs, Zed is the go-to app for you. 

It doesn’t matter if you are looking for a taxi ride, limo ride or need premium car for your travel, we are always there to help you make the journey count. 

 

Reach out to us for support: support@gozed.ae 

Or reach out to us through the chat support on the app for a faster response.

Single Global eSIM. No SIM Swaps. Multiple Ways to Connect.
Say goodbye to expensive roaming charges, skip airport SIM queues, ditch Wi-Fi hunting and travel smarter with Roamless eSIM — you can now choose between pay-as-you-go credits or smart data plans on the Roamless Single Global eSIM™ and get online in 200+ destinations instantly.

Whether you're exploring a single country or crossing borders daily, Roamless gives you full control over your mobile internet and in-app calls with flexible, secure service in 200+ countries while keeping your existing phone number (for WhatsApp, FaceTime, iMessage and more)

What Is an eSIM?
An eSIM (embedded SIM) is a digital SIM card built into your device. It lets you activate a mobile data plan without needing a physical SIM card — perfect for international travelers.
With Roamless, a single eSIM is all you need to stay connected across borders, without swapping SIM cards or dealing with local SIM vendors.

What is Roamless?
Roamless is a next-gen travel internet app using a Single Global eSIM™ for instant, reliable connectivity in 200+ countries. No more expensive roaming charges, no more managing SIM cards, and no more confusing eSIM stores. Just install your global Roamless eSIM once and get online anywhere.

Multiple Ways to Connect:
You can now choose between pay-as-you-go credits or data plans with one Single Global eSIM™

Roamless Flex – One Wallet, 200+ Destinations
• Best for multi-country travel and frequent flyers
• Add funds and use them globally
• Keep your remaining balance for your next trip; no expiration
• No need to switch plans or to select destinations
• Just travel to your destination and get online automatically

Roamless Fix – Fixed Plans for countries and regions
• Perfect for longer stays and destination-based use
• Prepaid data plans by country or region
• No contracts or hidden fees
• Pay once and stay connected during your trip

International In-App Voice Calls 
Make in-app voice calls to 200+ destinations starting at $0.01/min directly from inside the Roamless app. No third-party integrations needed. Just open the app and call any phone number worldwide including Europe, North America, Asia, and more

Why Choose Roamless?
• Single Global eSIM: Works in 200+ destinations including United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Turkey, Germany, Colombia, Australia, Italy, France, Spain, Thailand, Indonesia, India, Japan, China, South Korea, Saudi Arabia, the UAE and more
• Data + Voice in one app: Mobile internet and international in-app calling with a single wallet
• New Smart UI: Easily top-up, track usage and manage your plans
• Pay-as-you-go: Only pay for what you use — no wasted data, no expirations
• Unlimited hotspot; tethering allowed
• Transparent pricing: Plans starting $1.25/GB, pay-as-you-go starting from $2.45/GB
• Referral bonuses: Invite friends, get rewarded
• In-app support: Available 24/7 to assist you on the go

Built For:
• Travelers who hate roaming charges
• Vacationers looking for a quick way to get online
• Business travelers hopping between countries
• Digital nomads working remotely around the world
• Anyone tired of SIM swaps and overpaying for data

How Roamless Works:
• Download the Roamless app
• Set up your Single Global eSIM™ (one-time activation)
• Buy Flex credits or a Fix plan
• Start using data and in-app calls when you land
• Top up anytime, from anywhere

If you have a booked reservation with one of our customers (Hotel, BnB, Hostel, etc.), you will receive an SMS withing minutes of completing your reservation, asking you to download the RADEFY Guest App.

Once the app is installed on your mobile device, you must pass our security check, by entering your mobile phone number and then the 6-digit Access Code that you will receive via SMS.

The RADEFY Guest App will become active at the time and date you are scheduled to check-in, and will become deactivated after your check-out. Use the app to open your Hotel or Building main entrance and the Room or Apartment door.  As an alternative way, you may enter the PIN manually on the lock keypad.

Η εφαρμογή SmartTourAegean είναι μια εφαρμογή ψηφιακής ξενάγησης και περιλαμβάνει τέσσερις (4) διαδρομές των νησιών: Ικαρία, Πάτμος, Φούρνοι, Οινούσσες (1 διαδρομή για κάθε νησί). Ο χρήστης μπορεί να οδηγηθεί στα σημεία των διαδρομών, να δει φωτογραφίες και βίντεο, να διαβάσει τις πληροφορίες των σημείων. Το περιεχόμενο της εφαρμογής είναι το ίδιο με την πλατφόρμα https://aegean.smartour.gr/. Αποτελεί μία καινοτόμα εφαρμογή που επαυξάνει την εμπειρία του χρήστη μέσω της παροχής ψηφιακού περιεχομένου, offlinemaps, δυνατότητα προσωποποιημένης ξενάγησης ανάλογα με τις επιθυμίες του χρήστη, κ.α. Ο χρήστης μπορεί να επιλέξει είτε απευθείας την προκαθορισμένη διαδρομή, είτε να αποθηκεύσει τα αγαπημένα του σημεία και να δημιουργήσει τη δική του εφαρμογή. Επιπλέον, η εφαρμογή δίνει τη δυνατότητα σκαναρίσματος QR κωδικών. H εφαρμογή περιλαμβάνει ειδοποιήσεις όταν ο χρήστης περνάει δίπλα από ένα αξιοθέατο στον οποίο έχει τοποθετηθεί ειδική σήμανση. Επιπρόσθετα, η εφαρμογή περιλαμβάνει εικονικό ξεναγό, διαθέσιμο σε κάποια σημεία για τα οποία ο χρήστης ενημερώνεται για τη δυνατότητα ακουστικής ξενάγησης μέσω Augmented Reality. Υπάρχει η δυνατότητα συνομιλίας με άλλους χρήστες μέσω της Facebook σελίδας του SMART TOUR. Η εφαρμογή δημιουργήθηκε στο πλαίσιο του προγράμματος Συνεργασίας Interreg V-A «Ελλάδα – Κύπρος 2014 -2020» που συγχρηματοδοτείται από την Ευρωπαϊκή Ένωση (ΕΤΠΑ) και από Εθνικούς Πόρους της Ελλάδας και της Κύπρου.
